Name: Banished Monsters
About the game: 'Banished Monsters' is a visual novel put together by some random dude. Follow the story of a fomorian bunny , a creature that gets banished to earth and has to adapt to earth and its lifestyle . The novel has some scenes that contain some level of violence that is not advised for younger audiences , you have been warned. Key Features: A somewhat horribly written adventure visual novel You can kill any of the characters Multiple endings depending on the choices you make Hand-drawn visuals Things to know before buying : Game won't display dialogue if in full screen ; game is about two hours long
